name: Strange Friendship
description:
You play as Rachel. She is going to visit her best friend's house who just came from a mental hospital after trying to commit suicide. Rachel then will try to help her in the best way, but what is behind the truth about her going to a mental hospital?

This is my very first Visual Novel project! This is a story that I had in mind for years, I hope you all like as I progress and learn!

Story driven visual novel, with lots of ending and different paths depending on your choiches, meet new people find the truth, romance people in this amazing visual novel!

#game contains heavy verbal violence and text- violence, be aware

Huge thanks for Noraneko Games for giving out high quality assets to make this visual novel possible.

Release date: January 27, 2022 available for PC and Android
